page.title: 13Jobs in Tenbury 2
page.content: My Dad is a Game Keeper,he works in Bickley.In the month of June he has 100's of birds to rear.He has had some eggs,hatched them out and has had them since they were one day old They have chick feed and water.They are let into big runs so they have extra room.He rears pheasants and occasionally partridges in pens.They are small and fluffy. When they are old enough to go out in the open,my Dad arranges dates in the Autumn to go shooting.The men come from Kidderminster and around our area. My Dad works at Wells Drinks as a driver and he gets up at 5.00am at the earliest he goes all over the country .He has been away for 3 nights at once. Wells makes Blackcurrent, Soda Water, Spring Water, Orangeade, Cherrade,Lemonade, Coke and Orange.
